wikipedia_page.main: James 'Gordon' Black (born 8 July 1921) was a Scottish footballer who played for Hibernian, Falkirk, Dundee, St Johnstone and Dumbarton.

response: One month later, in July 1981, Power Corporation announced it was selling its subsidiary CSL Group for  million. CSL Group at this time included the shipping company, shipyards, engineering firms, and a bus service (Voyageur, previously known as Provincial Transport).  The following month, in August 1981, Paul Martin and his friend Lawrence Pathy with the help of Gordon Black, secured financing and announced their intention to purchase CSL Group Incorporated for the price advertised by Power Corporation.
